``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} - **Superficial head**: Flexor retinaculum @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **Deep head**: Capitate, Trapezium @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} Lateral side of base of 1st proximal phalan (*via the radial sesamoid*)@gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} - **Superficial head**: [Recurrent Br. of Median N.]({{< var ref-recurrent-branch-of-median-nerve.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **Deep head**: [Deep Br. of Ulnar N.]({{< var ref-deep-branch-of-ulnar-nerve.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - ([C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}}), [T1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.t1 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} **1st CMC**: Flexion @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Notes
